mapper.select: select a.AccountNm, s.accountid,c.CommonName, s.date, s.state from account as a inner join userfeestate as s on a.accountId = s.accountid inner join CommonCode as c on c.ClassCode = 'Position' and c.CommonCode = a.tpPosition where date like #{date} + '%'
select a.AccountNm, s.accountid, s.date, s.state from account as a inner join userfeestate as s on a.accountId = s.accountId where a.accountId = #{accountId}
